value:
$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|Prince Xander, let me see if I
understand this correctly...$k$pYour Kingdom, Nohr, was also
blessed by the blood of a dragon,
much like Hoshido.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_summer18,Face|Yes. In fact, if you look back at
our history...$k$pYou could say that the war between
our two countries began as a war
between two of the First Dragons.$k$pWe have put an end to it, though.
Prince Ryoma and I both live for our
kingdoms and our people.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|The gods pass on. The era of man
begins...$k$pThat may be what the gods desired
all along.$k$pAah! Yune! What's gotten into you?
Are you happy to be at the festival
too?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Ah, there the two of you are.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_summer18,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Come now! The contract demands
you take to the battlefield. Off you
go—give it your all.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03_2,0|$WmMPID_夏祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_summer18,Face|We are left with no choice but to
retreat, Lady Micaiah.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|Yes. But until our contract is broken,
we will fight on...$k$p$Sbs150|
